item.text: The residents of Jerusalem made his youngest son Ahaziah king in his place, for the raiding party that invaded the camp with the Arabs had killed all the older sons. So Ahaziah son of Jehoram became king of Judah.

<st data-num="0274" class="">Ahaziah</st> was <st data-num="06242" class="">twenty</st>-<st data-num="08147" class="">two</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> when he <st data-num="04427" class="">became king</st>, and he <st data-num="04427" class="">reigned</st> for <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> in <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>. His <st data-num="08034 0517">mother</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="06271" class="">Athaliah</st>, the <st data-num="01323" class="">granddaughter</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="06018" class="">Omri</st>.

<st data-num="01571 01931">He</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">followed</st> in the <st data-num="01870" class="">footsteps</st> of <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">dynasty</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> his <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">gave</st> him <st data-num="07561" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="03289" class="">advice</st>.<n id="2" />
He did evil in the sight of the Lord like Ahab’s dynasty because, after his father’s death, they gave him advice that led to his destruction.

He <st data-num="01980" class="">followed</st> their <st data-num="01571 06098">advice</st> and <st data-num="01980 0854">joined</st> <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="03088" class="">Joram</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> in a <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="02371" class="">Hazael</st> of <st data-num="0758" class="">Syria</st><n id="2" /> at <st data-num="07433" class="">Ramoth</st> <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> in which the <st data-num="07421" class="">Syrians</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">defeated</st> <st data-num="03141" class="">Joram</st>.

Joram returned to Jezreel to recover from the wounds he received from the Syrians in Ramah when he fought against King Hazael of Syria. Ahaziah son of King Jehoram of Judah went down to visit Joram son of Ahab in Jezreel, because he had been wounded.
God brought about Ahaziah’s downfall through his visit to Joram. When Ahaziah arrived, he went out with Joram to meet Jehu son of Nimshi, whom the Lord had commissioned to wipe out Ahab’s family.

While <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="08199" class="">dishing out punishment</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st>, he <st data-num="04672" class="">discovered</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and the <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="0274" class="">Ahaziah’s</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">relatives</st> who were <st data-num="08334" class="">serving</st> <st data-num="0274" class="">Ahaziah</st> and <st data-num="02026" class="">killed</st> them.

He looked for Ahaziah, who was captured while hiding in Samaria. They brought him to Jehu and then executed him. They did give him a burial, for they reasoned, “He is the son of Jehoshaphat, who sought the Lord with his whole heart.” There was no one in Ahaziah’s family strong enough to rule in his place.
When Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she was determined to destroy the entire royal line of Judah.

So <st data-num="03090" class="">Jehoshabeath</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> Jehoram,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> <st data-num="0274" class="">Ahaziah’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="03101" class="">Joash</st> and <st data-num="01589" class="">stole</st> him <st data-num="01589" class="">away</st> from the <st data-num="08432" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> who were to be <st data-num="04191" class="">executed</st>. She <st data-num="05414" class="">hid</st> him and his <st data-num="03243" class="">nurse</st> in the <st data-num="02315" class="">room</st> where the <st data-num="04296" class="">bed</st> covers were stored. So <st data-num="03090" class="">Jehoshabeath</st> the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="03088" class="">Jehoram</st>, <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> of <st data-num="03077" class="">Jehoiada</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="03588 01931 01961">and</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> of <st data-num="0274" class="">Ahaziah</st>, <st data-num="05641" class="">hid</st> him <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> <st data-num="06271" class="">Athaliah</st> so she could <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">execute</st> him.
He remained in hiding in God’s temple for six years while Athaliah was ruling over the land.
